overview: Get ready to have your head cave in from the cerebral assault of Lost & Found Vol. 12! See MULTIPLE Ninja Operation movie trailers, Steven Seagal eating carrots and patting watermelons, the grand opening of Hulk Hogan’s Pastamania restaurant, rapper Ice Cube TV commercials, Klaus Kinski getting mad, “Scream” reimagined as an Argento Giallo classic, Alex Jones mocking Piers Morgan’s accent, Orson Welles interviewing Andy Kaufman, 1-900 commercials from the 90’s, Robert Blake on the Tom Snyder Show in 1996, public access, instructional and religious video weirdness, music from Stranger Cole, Palace, Brian Eno, Radiohead, Matching Mole, a Gong Show performance from Rhonda Shear and a seemingly endless amount more!
title: Lost & Found Video Night Vol. 12
